title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 355.1 - Employer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 355.1 - Employer

State Regulations

Every person, partnership, association, corporation, legal representative of a deceased employer, or the receiver, assignee or
trustee of a person, partnership, association or corporation, who has persons
in employment as defined in subdivision 6 of section
201
of the Workers' Compensation Law is an employer; not including, however, the

State, a municipal corporation, local governmental agency, other political
subdivision or public authority, except that, pursuant to section 212, a public
authority, municipal corporation, fire district or other political subdivision
may elect to become a covered employer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
355.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
